text: Nitish Mishra (born 9 July 1973) is an Indian politician hailing from eastern Indian state of Bihar, India. He represented Jhanjharpur assembly constituency in Madhubani district in 13th, 14th and 15th Bihar Legislative Assembly. Presently, he is member of 17th Bihar Legislative Assembly from Jhanjharpur and also Vice President, BJP - Bihar. == References == Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Bihari politicians
title: Nitish Mishra
